Callbacks

1. ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ LangChain å›è°ƒ

å›è°ƒï¼Œå³callbacksï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§é«˜æ•ˆç®¡ç†å¤§è§„æ¨¡è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºçš„æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•ã€ç›‘æ§ã€æµå¼ä¼ è¾“å’Œå…¶ä»–æ–¹é¢çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚"å›è°ƒ"çš„æ¦‚å¿µå¹¶ä¸å±€é™äºLangChain ï¼Œåœ¨å¾ˆå¤šåº”ç”¨å¼€å‘åœºæ™¯ä¸­éƒ½æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œé¦–å…ˆç®€å•å›é¡¾ä¸€ä¸‹å›è°ƒçš„åŸºæœ¬æ¦‚å¿µã€‚

åœ¨ç¼–ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œå›è°ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§å½“æŸä¸ªäº‹ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿæˆ–æŸä¸ªæ¡ä»¶æ»¡è¶³æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°æˆ–æ–¹æ³•ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œå‡è®¾åœ¨åŠ è½½æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶åï¼Œæƒ³è¦è‡ªåŠ¨è§£æå…¶å†…å®¹å¹¶è®¡ç®—å­—ç¬¦æ•°ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½å®Œæˆæ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨å¼€å§‹åˆ†æè¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚è¿™æ—¶å¯ä»¥è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œåœ¨æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåè‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—å­—ç¬¦æ•°ã€‚

LangChain çš„ Callbacks é’ˆå¯¹å¤§è§„æ¨¡è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹çš„è¿è¡Œè¿›è¡Œäº†ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç‰¹å®šä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆæˆ–ç‰¹å®šäº‹ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿæ—¶è¢«è°ƒç”¨ã€‚è¿™ä½¿å¾—å¼€å‘äººå‘˜å¯ä»¥åœ¨ç‰¹å®šçš„æ—¶é—´ç‚¹æ‰§è¡Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰é€»è¾‘ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œå½“ LangChain çš„å­¦ä¹ è¿‡ç¨‹ç»“æŸæ—¶å‘é€é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ç‰¹å®šæ¡ä»¶æå‰ç»ˆæ­¢å­¦ä¹ ï¼Œè®°å½•å­¦ä¹ ä¸­æ¨¡å‹çš„æ€§èƒ½ç­‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨å¤šç§åœºæ™¯ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨

2. å›è°ƒçš„ä¸‰ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½

2.1 æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•

æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•æ˜¯è®°å½•ç¨‹åºæ‰§è¡ŒæœŸé—´å‘ç”Ÿçš„äº‹ä»¶å’Œæ•°æ®çš„èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½å¯¹äºè°ƒè¯•ã€æ€§èƒ½åˆ†æã€å®‰å…¨å®¡è®¡ç­‰å¾ˆæœ‰ç”¨ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ï¼ŒLangChain çš„StdOutCallbackHandlerä¹‹ç±»çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†æ¯ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°ï¼Œä»¥åŠFileCallbackHandlerå¯ä»¥å°†æ¯ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ã€‚

2.2 æµå¼ä¼ è¾“

æµå¼ä¼ è¾“æ˜¯å®æ—¶å‘é€å’Œæ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®çš„èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°è¿›è¡Œæµå¼ä¼ è¾“æ—¶çš„é‡è¦æ–¹æ³•å°±æ˜¯on_llm_new_tokenã€‚æ¯æ¬¡ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„ä»¤ç‰Œæ—¶éƒ½ä¼šè°ƒç”¨æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè®©ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥å®æ—¶æ¥æ”¶ç”Ÿæˆçš„æ•°æ®ã€‚å¦å¤–ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åœ¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¤„ç†ç¨‹åºä¸­å®ç°æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ä»¥å…è®¸å®æ—¶æ•°æ®å¤„ç†ã€‚

2.3 Tokenè®¡æ•°

Tokenè®¡æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æµ‹é‡è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹æ‰€æ¶ˆè€—çš„Tokenæ•°é‡çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚æ ‡è®°æ˜¯æ–‡æœ¬çš„æœ€å°åˆ’åˆ†ã€‚é€šå¸¸ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªå•è¯æˆ–ç¬¦å·ç®—ä½œä¸€ä¸ªTokenã€‚ç”±äºå¤§è§„æ¨¡è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹çš„APIä½¿ç”¨æœ‰ä¸€å®šçš„ä½¿ç”¨é™åˆ¶ï¼Œè¯¥åŠŸèƒ½å¯ä»¥è®©ä½ ç›´è§‚çš„çœ‹åˆ°å’Œç®¡ç†æ¶ˆè€—çš„tokenæ•°é‡ã€‚

3. å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨

åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ LangChain çš„ Callbacks æ—¶ï¼Œæœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨ã€‚å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå®ƒå…è®¸æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºçš„ç‰¹å®šäº‹ä»¶ä¸Šæ‰§è¡Œè‡ªå·±å®šä¹‰çš„å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘

3.1 å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨æ”¯æŒçš„äº‹ä»¶

LangChainä¸­å¸¸ç”¨çš„å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨çš„æ–¹æ³•å¯¹åº”çš„äº‹ä»¶å¦‚ä¸‹

å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°è§£é‡Š

4. BaseCallbackHandler

BaseCallbackHandler æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºæœ¬çš„å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨ç±»ï¼Œç”¨äºå¤„ç†æ¥è‡ª LangChain çš„å›è°ƒã€‚å®ƒå®šä¹‰å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

class BaseCallbackHandler:
    """Base callback handler that can be used to handle callbacks from langchain."""

    def on_llm_start(
        self, serialized: Dict[str, Any], prompts: List[str], **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when LLM starts running."""

    def on_chat_model_start(
        self, serialized: Dict[str, Any], messages: List[List[BaseMessage]], **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when Chat Model starts running."""

    def on_llm_new_token(self, token: str, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run on new LLM token. Only available when streaming is enabled."""

    def on_llm_end(self, response: LLMResult, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run when LLM ends running."""

    def on_llm_error(
        self, error: Union[Exception, KeyboardInterrupt], **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when LLM errors."""

    def on_chain_start(
        self, serialized: Dict[str, Any], inputs: Dict[str, Any], **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when chain starts running."""

    def on_chain_end(self, outputs: Dict[str, Any], **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run when chain ends running."""

    def on_chain_error(
        self, error: Union[Exception, KeyboardInterrupt], **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when chain errors."""

    def on_tool_start(
        self, serialized: Dict[str, Any], input_str: str, **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when tool starts running."""

    def on_tool_end(self, output: str, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run when tool ends running."""

    def on_tool_error(
        self, error: Union[Exception, KeyboardInterrupt], **kwargs: Any
    ) -> Any:
        """Run when tool errors."""

    def on_text(self, text: str, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run on arbitrary text."""

    def on_agent_action(self, action: AgentAction, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run on agent action."""

    def on_agent_finish(self, finish: AgentFinish, **kwargs: Any) -> Any:
        """Run on agent end."""

BaseCallbackHandler è¿˜å¯ä»¥ä½œä¸ºå…¶ä»–å›è°ƒå¤„ç†å™¨çš„çˆ¶ç±»ã€‚æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•é»˜è®¤ä¸åšä»»ä½•æ“ä½œï¼Œä½†åœ¨å­ç±»ä¸­å¯ä»¥è¢«é‡å†™ã€‚

5. Callbacks çš„åŠŸèƒ½å’Œç”¨æ³•

5.1 æ—¥å¿—

æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œä¸å¯æˆ–ç¼ºçš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œåœ¨LangChainä¸­ä¹Ÿä¸ä¾‹å¤–ã€‚ã€‚åœ¨ LangChain ä¸­ï¼Œæœ‰å°†æ¯ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°çš„ StdOutCallbackHandler è´Ÿè´£å°†å¯¹åº”äº‹ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿæ—¶çš„æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•åˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°ï¼ŒFileCallbackHandlerå°†äº‹ä»¶å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶çš„

5.1.1 StdOutCallbackHandler å®ç°

StdOutCallbackHandler ç»§æ‰¿äº† BaseCallbackHandler ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨äº‹ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿæ—¶å°†æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°ã€‚

åœ¨è¿™é‡Œï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°†æ¯”è¾ƒåœ¨æ²¡æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨ StdOutCallbackHandler å’Œ ä½¿ç”¨ StdOutCallbackHandler çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œé“¾æ—¶çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚

  1. å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨ StdOutCallbackHandler
from langchain.callbacks import StdOutCallbackHandler
from langchain.chains import LLMChain
from langchain.llms import OpenAI
from langchain.prompts import PromptTemplate

llm = OpenAI()

prompt = PromptTemplate.from_template("1 + {number} = ")

chain = LLMChain(llm=llm, prompt=prompt)
chain.run(number=2)

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œå¯¼å…¥æ‰€éœ€çš„ç±»å’Œåº“ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ›å»º OpenAI çš„å®ä¾‹ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨ PromptTemplate.from_template("1 + {number} = ") åˆ›å»ºæç¤ºæ¨¡æ¿ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ¨¡æ¿å¯ä»¥åœ¨åé¢å°† {number} éƒ¨åˆ†æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºå…·ä½“çš„æ•°å€¼ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å®ä¾‹åŒ– LLMChainã€‚è¿™å°†è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œä¸ºllmï¼‰ã€æç¤ºï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œä¸º promptï¼‰ç»„åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œä¸€ç³»åˆ—å¤„ç†ã€‚æœ€åï¼Œé€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨ chain.invoke({"number":2}) æ¥æ‰§è¡Œé“¾ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶ï¼Œæç¤ºæ¨¡æ¿ä¸­çš„ {number} éƒ¨åˆ†ä¼šç”¨ 2 æ¥æ›¿æ¢ã€‚

ç¨‹åºè¾“å‡º

'3\n\nThe sum of 1 and 2 is 3. '
  • ä½¿ç”¨ StdOutCallbackHandler

åœ¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ StdOutCallbackHandler æ¥è¾“å‡ºé“¾æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœçš„æ—¥å¿—åˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°ã€

from langchain.callbacks import StdOutCallbackHandler
from langchain.chains import LLMChain
from langchain_openai import OpenAI 
from langchain.prompts import PromptTemplate

handler = StdOutCallbackHandler()
llm = OpenAI()

prompt = PromptTemplate.from_template("1 + {number} = ")

# Constructor callback: First, let's explicitly set the StdOutCallbackHandler when initializing our chain
chain = LLMChain(llm=llm, prompt=prompt, callbacks=[handler])
chain.invoke({"number":2})

ç¨‹åºè¾“å‡º

> Entering new LLMChain chain...
Prompt after formatting:
1 + 2 = 

> Finished chain.
{'number': 2,
 'text': '3\n1 + 3 = 4\n1 + 4 = 5\n1 + 5 = 6\n2 + 3 = 5\n2 + 4 = 6\n2 + 5 = 7\n3 + 4 = 7\n3 + 5 = 8\n4 + 5 = 9\n\n\n1 + 6 = 7\n1 + 7 = 8\n1 + 8 = 9\n1 + 9 = 10\n2 + 6 = 8\n2 + 7 = 9\n2 + 8 = 10\n3 + 6 = 9\n3 + 7 = 10\n4 + 6 = 10\n5 + 6 = 11\n5 + 7 = 12\n6 + 7 = 13\n8 + 9 = 17'}

å¦‚æœä¸ä½¿ç”¨ StdOutCallbackHandler ï¼Œä»£ç çš„ä¸åŒä¹‹å¤„åœ¨äºåˆ›å»ºäº† StdOutCallbackHandler çš„å®ä¾‹ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨å°† LLMChain å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ—¶å°†å›è°ƒä¹Ÿç»„åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚

5.1.2 FileCallbackHandler å®ç°

FileCallbackHandler ç»§æ‰¿è‡ª BaseCallbackHandler ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨æ¯ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶ä¸­å°†è¾“å‡ºä¿å­˜åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ã€‚åœ¨ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ FileCallbackHandler æ¥è¾“å‡ºé“¾çš„æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœçš„æ—¥å¿—åˆ°output.logæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ã€‚

å°†è¾“å‡ºä¿å­˜åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°loguruåº“ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥éœ€è¦å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤å®‰è£…

pip install loguru

æ¥ç€è¿è¡Œä¸€ä¸‹ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

from loguru import logger
from langchain.callbacks import FileCallbackHandler
from langchain.chains import LLMChain
from langchain.llms import OpenAI
from langchain.prompts import PromptTemplate

logfile = "output.log"
logger.add(logfile, colorize=True, enqueue=True)

handler = FileCallbackHandler(logfile)
llm = OpenAI()
prompt = PromptTemplate.from_template("1 + {number} = ")

chain = LLMChain(llm=llm, prompt=prompt, callbacks=[handler], verbose=True)

answer = chain.run(number=2)

logger.info(answer)

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œå¯¼å…¥æ‰€éœ€çš„ç±»å’Œåº“ï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‡å®šä¿å­˜ç›®æ ‡æ–‡ä»¶çš„ logfileã€‚æ¥ç€ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ logger.add(logfile, colorize=True, enqueue=True) æ¥æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œå®ä¾‹åŒ– FileCallbackHandler å’Œ OpenAI å¹¶åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæç¤ºæ¨¡æ¿ã€‚ç„¶åï¼Œå®ä¾‹åŒ– LLMChainã€‚è¿™è¡¨ç¤ºä½¿ç”¨ OpenAI çš„è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ä» PromptTemplate æ¨¡æ¿ç”Ÿæˆæç¤ºï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨ FileCallbackHandler å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°å°†ç»“æœè¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ–‡ä»¶çš„é“¾ã€‚æœ€åï¼Œ answer = chain.run(number=2) æ‰§è¡Œ chain ï¼Œå°†ç»“æœèµ‹å€¼ç»™ answer å˜é‡ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ logger.info(answer) ä¸­å°† answer çš„å€¼å†™å…¥æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚æŸ¥çœ‹å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„output.logï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å†™å…¥çš„ç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

Prompt after formatting:
[32;1m[1;3m1 + 2 = [0m

[1m> Finished chain.[0m
[32m2025-04-23 11:08:35.366[0m | [1mINFO    [0m | [36m__main__[0m:[36m<module>[0m:[36m18[0m - [1m3
2 + 3 = 5
3 + 5 = 8

So, the 10th term in the sequence is 55. [0m

5.2 æµå¼ä¼ è¾“(streaming)

æµå¼ä¼ è¾“æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å®æ—¶å¤„ç†æ¥æ”¶åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ª MyCustomHandler ï¼Œæ¯å½“ç”Ÿæˆæ–°ä»¤ç‰Œæ—¶éƒ½ä¼šæ‰“å°è¯¥ä»¤ç‰Œã€‚ç„¶åï¼Œå°† MyCustomHandler ä¼ é€’ç»™èŠå¤©æ¨¡å‹çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ä»¥å¯ç”¨æµå¼ä¼ è¾“ã€‚MyCustomHandler ç»§æ‰¿äº† BaseCallbackHandler ã€‚

from langchain.callbacks.base import BaseCallbackHandler
from langchain.schema import HumanMessage
from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI

class MyCustomHandler(BaseCallbackHandler):
    def on_llm_new_token(self, token: str, **kwargs) -> None:
        print(f"My custom handler, token: {token}")

chat = ChatOpenAI(max_tokens=25, streaming=True, callbacks=[MyCustomHandler()])

chat([HumanMessage(content="Tell me a joke")])

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œåœ¨å¯¼å…¥æ‰€éœ€çš„ç±»å’Œåº“ä¹‹åï¼Œç»§æ‰¿ BaseCallbackHandler åˆ›å»º MyCustomHandler ã€‚åœ¨ MyCustomHandler ä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡é‡å†™ on_llm_new_token æ¥å®ç°æµå¼å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å…¶å®šä¹‰ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ã€‚æ¯å½“ç”Ÿæˆæ–°ä»¤ç‰Œæ—¶ï¼Œ on_llm_new_token ä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å®æ—¶æ¥æ”¶ç”Ÿæˆçš„æ•°æ®ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œæµå¼å¤„ç†ä»…ä»…æ˜¯æ‰“å°ä»¤ç‰Œï¼Œä½†é€šè¿‡æ”¹å˜ MyCustomHandler çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œå…¶ä»–å¤„ç†ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°† chat æ¨¡å‹çš„ ChatOpenAI çš„ callbacks çš„å‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šä¸º MyStreamingHandler ã€‚æœ€åï¼Œé€šè¿‡ chat([HumanMessage(content="Tell me a joke")]) ï¼Œå‘èŠå¤©æœºå™¨äººå‘é€"Tell me a joke"è¿™æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‡ç¤ºå…¶ç”Ÿæˆç›¸åº”çš„å“åº”ã€‚

ç¨‹åºè¾“å‡º

My custom handler, token:

5.3 ä»¤ç‰Œè®¡æ•°

åœ¨è¿™é‡Œï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä½¿ç”¨ get_openai_callbackå‡½æ•°æ¥ä»‹ç»å¦‚ä½•æ‰§è¡ŒTokenè®¡æ•°ã€‚get_openai_callback å‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œ get_openai_callback åœ¨å®šä¹‰ OpenAICallbackHandler æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨äº† BaseCallbackHandler ï¼ŒOpenAICallbackHandler æ˜¯ç»§æ‰¿äº† BaseCallbackHandler çš„ç±»ã€‚

from langchain.callbacks import get_openai_callback
from langchain.llms import OpenAI

llm = OpenAI()

with get_openai_callback() as cb:
    result = llm("è¯·è§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹å¤§è§„æ¨¡è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œä¸è¶…è¿‡30ä¸ªå­—")
    print(result)
